testcase.name: Login with invalid user name - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: When I enter username as "invalidUsername"..................................passed And I enter password as "secret_sauce"......................................passed And I login.................................................................passed Then login should fail with an error "Username and password do not match any user in this service.".passed

testcase.name: Login with invalid password - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: When I enter username as "standard_user"....................................passed And I enter password as "invalidPassword"...................................passed And I login.................................................................passed Then login should fail with an error "Username and password do not match any user in this service.".passed

testcase.name: Login with valid user name and password - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: When I enter username as "standard_user"....................................passed And I enter password as "secret_sauce"......................................passed And I login.................................................................passed Then I should see Products page with title "PRODUCTS".......................passed

testcase.name: Validate product info on Products page - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given I'm logged in.........................................................passed Then the product is listed with title "Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt" and price "$15.99".passed

testcase.name: Validate product info on Products page - Example #1.2
testcase.system-out: Given I'm logged in.........................................................passed Then the product is listed with title "Sauce Labs Backpack" and price "$29.99".passed
